attributes.action: make all the rules for IVF the same for everyone going throug IVF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: me and my partner have been trying to have a baby for 7 years but due to my tubes being damaged we are unable to have a family naturally, we have gone down the road of IVF but have been turned down due to the fact that my partner has a child from a previous relationship. We have wrote letters to our local PCT and they have refused to give us funding even though we appealed this decision and then was still refused, but when I went to a different hospital in the area they said I could have the funding from the NHS but I would have to move into the area. which confussed me as it seams to be  ‘post code lottery’ we feel we have been treated very unfairly and are rather upset as without  IVF  we are unable to have a child of our own that we hope for.
